title: Inside the world's largest crystal 'cave' - BBC Reel
description: Discovered in 1999 inside an abandoned mine in Southern Spain, Pulpí Geode is the largest crystal 'cave' of its kind in the world. But what exactly is a geode and how do crystals form inside them? Discover and be amazed by this wonder of nature. A film by Next Stop Stories
